r.s: Message hash and digest (HMAC) generation methods and classes
r.d: Classes for message hashing and HMAC signature generation using the mhash functions.
r.n:
Added fallback classes and methods for MD5 and SHA1 hashing and HMAC generation. Only those two hashing algorithms can be used if mhash is not found.
The mhash extension is only needed when using hashing algorithms other than MD5 and SHA1, which are now implemented in the core of the language. Included scripts that use the fallback classes explicitely.
